alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northwest Yell County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Scott, Yell and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mount Magazine to near Gravelly to 12 miles northwest of Oden. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Oden... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Sunlight Bay Park... Chula... Macedonia in Yell County... Waveland... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western and central Arkansas.
